org.openimaj.text.nlp.sentiment.type

Interface Sentiment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BipolarSentiment, DiscreteCountBipolarSentiment, TFFCountSentiment, WeightedBipolarSentiment

    public interface Sentiment
    A generic sentiment. As sentiments can be very simply (+/-), weighted positive negative or generic things such as mood, the root mainly provide the ability to be returned as a map of results (useful for writing to JSON). However, individual instances are also expected to list the various forms a given sentiment type can take.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
